desc: mHistogram generates a histogram from an image (to be used by mViewer mostly).

arguments.name: minString
arguments.desc: Data range minimum as a string (to allow '%' and 's' suffix.

arguments.name: maxString
arguments.desc: Data range maximum as a string (to allow '%' and 's' suffix.

arguments.name: stretchType
arguments.desc: Stretch type (linear, power(log**N), sinh, gaussian or gaussian-log)

arguments.name: grayLogPower
arguments.desc: If the stretch type is log to a power, the power value.

arguments.name: betaString
arguments.desc: If the stretch type is asinh, the transition data value.

return.name: minval
return.desc: Data value associated with histogram minimum.

return.name: maxval
return.desc: Data value associated with histogram maximum.
